Package antgame.core.brain.instruction

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Condition
    Represents a type of sense condition.
    DropInstruction
    Represents a drop instruction.
    FlipInstruction
    Represents a flip instruction.
    Instruction
    Represents an abstract instruction, i.e.
    MarkInstruction
    Represents a mark instruction.
    MoveInstruction
    Represents an instruction for an ant to move in the current direction.
    PickUpInstruction
    Represents an instruction for an ant to pick up food at the current cell.
    SenseInstruction
    Represents an instruction to perform a sense operation in a particular direction.
    TurnInstruction
    Represents an instruction for an ant to turn in a given direction.
    UnmarkInstruction
    Represents an instruction to remove a marker from a cell.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Condition.Type
    Describes a type of sense condition.
    Instruction.Type
    Represents an instruction type.
    SenseInstruction.Direction
    Represents a possible sense direction.
    TurnInstruction.Direction
    Represents a possible turn direction.
